info.title: Sentinel API
info.description: API for the Sentinel code security analysis platform

get.summary: Gets time series data for pattern matches

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for the time series (default: 30 days ago)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for the time series (default: today)

get.summary: Lists pattern matches for an analysis job

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for the time series (default: 30 days ago)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for the time series (default: today)

get.summary: Gets time series data for pattern matches in an analysis job
